title: 请看下~~~~~~~~~
body:
由于早期版本的脚本~一次性生成了100个providers，新脚本运行时候提示：
[2024-12-06T07:02:48.881Z] [INFO]: Attempting Register for azhardsner2356@gmail.com
[2024-12-06T07:02:49.104Z] [ERROR]: register error for azhardsner2356: [object Object]

即使删除了多余的providers，还是会有相同的报错~并且获取不到token,不知道问题在哪？

可否让脚本直接从生成的100个中提取一个出来~否则每个账号要在网页登陆进去删除多余providers
author: xinzhongyouhai

comments.body: you need to delete manual providers first in oasis dashboard, or just copy token and paste to providers.txt

title: help
body: It is better to use a single agent with a single account and a single token to generate a single provider. The script either says to go to the mailbox to receive emails (the actual account has been activated), or it generates 100 providers at once, and then prompts the agent to report an error. Strange. It is convenient to say How does this project work?
author: xinzhongyouhai

comments.body: The name of the provider should be improved to make it easier to be banned
